long_description: When no other Yakima rack will work for you, Tracks with PlusNut hardware can be custom-installed on your vehicle roof--ideal for camper shells or other tricky situations. Heavy-duty, corrosion-resistant, anodized aluminum 54 in. long tracks make virtually any vehicle ready to accept Control Towers and Landing Pads, sold separately. Stainless-steel PlusNut(R) hardware mounts Tracks securely to vehicle roof. All installation hardware included. Compatible with Yakima Control Tower Landing Pads #1, sold separately.
short_description: When no other Yakima rack will work for you, Tracks with PlusNut hardware can be custom-installed on your vehicle roof--ideal for camper shells or other tricky situations.
